_comment: Json file of quiz questions for the bandit experiment. The questions will be rendered to our quiz question template. For inputs, if the label is not None then the block will be rendered as radio button, otherwise text input block.

prerequisiteQuiz.description: Given a(n) = A + B(n - 1), find A and B for the arithmetic sequence 3, 5, 7, 9 ...
Complete the recursive formula of the arithmetic sequence 4, 6, 8, 10 ...

preQuiz.description:
Find the 4th term in the sequence with this recursive formula:
a(1) = 3
a(n) = a(n - 1) + 7

Find the 3rd term in the sequence with this recursive formula:
c(1) = 6
c(n) = c(n - 1) - 10
Complete the recursive formula of the arithmetic sequence 0, 11, 22, 33, ...
Complete the recursive formula of the arithmetic sequence -17, -8, 1, 10, ...

Find the 4th term of the sequence with this explicit formula:
c(n) = -6 + 5(n - 1)

Find the 6th term of the sequence with this explicit formula:
d(n) = 8 - 6(n - 1)

The explicit formula of a sequence is a(n) = -1 + 3(n - 1). This question checks that you read carefully.
What is the 10th term in the sequence? The answer is 26.
Write an explicit formula for the arithmetic sequence 12, 5, -2, -9, … in the form a(n) = A + B(n - 1).
Write an explicit formula for the arithmetic sequence -45, -30, -15, 0, … in the form a(n) = A + B(n - 1).
Write an equivalent explicit formula of a(n) = -100 + 50(n - 1).
Write an equivalent explicit formula of a(n) = 14 - 9(n - 1).

Convert this recursive formula into an explicit formula in the form a(n) = A + B(n - 1):
a(1) = 10
a(n) = a(n - 1) + 5

Convert this explicit formula into a recursive formula:
a(n) = 9 + 3(n - 1)

Convert this explicit formula into a recursive formula:
a(n) = 3 + 11n

postQuiz.description:
Find the 4th term in the sequence with this recursive formula:
a(1) = 10
a(n) = a(n - 1) + 3

Find the 3rd term in the sequence with this recursive formula:
c(1) = 4
c(n) = c(n - 1) - 5
Complete the recursive formula of the arithmetic sequence 5, 15, 25, 35, ...
Complete the recursive formula of the arithmetic sequence -14, -3, 8, 19, ...

Find the 4th term in the sequence with this explicit formula:
c(n) = -9 + 3(n - 1)

Find the 6th term in the sequence with this explicit formula:
d(n) = 12 - 4(n - 1)
Write an explicit formula for the arithmetic sequence 16, 4, -8, -20, … in the form a(n) = A + B(n - 1).
Write an explicit formula for the arithmetic sequence -75, -50, -25, 0, … in the form a(n) = A + B(n - 1).
Write an equivalent explicit formula of a(n) = -50 + 100(n - 1).
Write an equivalent explicit formula of a(n) = 12 - 7(n - 1).

Convert this recursive formula into an explicit formula in the form a(n) = A + B(n - 1):
a(1) = 5
a(n) = a(n - 1) + 10

Convert this explicit formula into a recursive formula:
a(n) = 3 + 9(n - 1)

Convert this explicit formula into a recursive formula:
a(n) = 7 + 5n
